K12D0483_H0457:359a-23: / so // sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems //
K12D0483_H0457:359a-24: bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa //
K12D0483_H0457:359a-25: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang //
K12D0483_H0457:359a-26: de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs //
K12D0483_H0457:359a-27: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams
K12D0483_H0457:359a-28: cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor
K12D0483_H0457:359b-0: 'di gsungs so // gtsug @359b lag khang dang skyed mos tshal //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-1: mchod rten lha khang kun dga' sogs //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-2: ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-3: gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsam //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-4: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-5: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-6: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-7: rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dang //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-8: them skas bzhi yi phreng ba dang //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-9: seng ge ba glang rnams kyis brgyan //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-10: dar dang lnga ldi do shal phreng //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-11: dril bu dang ni rnga mas brgyan //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-12: rdo rje rin chen padma dang //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-13: rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-14: srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa dang //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-15: phyi yi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-16: dgu yi char ni bgos pa las //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-17: sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-18: rdo rje srad bus thig gdab po //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-19: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-21: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug /
K12D0483_H0457:359b-22: rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-23: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-24: dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-25: dung dang kun da zla 'dra la //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-26: zhal bzhi pa la rdo rje yi //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-27: seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-28: ting 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-29: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-30: de yi spyan sngar ngan song kun //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-31: sbyong ba'i rgyal po bri bya ste //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-32: phyag gnyis ting 'dzin tshul du bsnol //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-33: zla ba rgyas dang padma'i mdog /
K12D0483_H0457:359b-34: rgyan rnams kun gyis legs rdzogs la //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-35: rgyal mchog skyes bus gang bar bri //
K12D0483_H0457:359b-36: rgyab tu sh'akya'i rigs dbang po //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-1: bo thub pa bri bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-2: g-yon dang g-yas kyi phyogs char ni //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-3: rgyal mchog rin chen me tog gnyis //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-4: lo tsa n'a dang m'a ma k'i /
K12D0483_H0457:360a-5: de bzhin dkar mo sgrol ma rnams /
K12D0483_H0457:360a-6: rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-7: grva yi phyogs ni kun tu bri //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-8: rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-9: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog /
K12D0483_H0457:360a-10: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sems dpa' rnams //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-11: go rims bzhin du bri bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-12: mkhas pas l'a s+ya la sogs pa //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-13: mchod pa grva yi phyogs su bri //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-14: sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-15: sgo ba bzhi ni bri bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-16: rta babs khyams ni thams cad du //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-17: byams pa la sogs bri bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-18: nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-19: de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-20: khro bo mngag gzhug pho nya sogs //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-21: bri bya yang na ming yang rung //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-22: phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-23: gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-24: 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-25: byang phyogs su ni dbang phyug che //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-26: shar dang nub kyi gling du ni //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-27: brgya byin gtogs 'dod thams cad ni //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-28: 'khor dang bcas par bri bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-29: gzhan rnams dag kyang de bzhin te //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-30: lha min dri za nam mkha' lding //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-31: gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phyo che //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-33: klu dang grul bum ri rnams dang //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-34: rgyal po bzhi rnams bri bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360a-35: gza' dang skar ma rgyu skar dang //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-0: khro @360b bo ma rungs 'tshe ba yi //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-1: bgegs dang bi n'a ya ka rnams //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-2: sems can kun la phan byed pa'i //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-3: drang srong skal ba chen po rnams //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-4: phra men ma dang bud med bri //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-5: de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-6: 'byung ba bzhi yi lha chen po //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-7: khyim dang ri la gnas pa dang //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-8: shing dang kun dga'i nags la sogs //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-9: dur khrod grong khyer gnas pa rnams //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-10: ming dang brda' 'am yang na ni //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-11: thig le rnams kyang bri bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-12: de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-13: bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-14: gdugs dang rnga ma lda ldi dang //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-15: 'phan dang sna tshogs na bzas mchod //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-16: gser las byas pa'i bya rnams ni //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-17: brgyad dam bcu drug lhag kyang rung //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-18: dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-19: bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-20: mar me gtor ma bum pa dang //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-21: mdzes pa'i bshos rnams gzhag bya ste //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-22: bza' ba btung ba sbyar legs dang //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-23: bca' ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-24: gnod sbyin srin po'i kha zas su //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-25: gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag /
K12D0483_H0457:360b-26: 'byung po dag dang klu dag dang //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-27: mi dang mi min de bzhin te //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-28: me tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-29: 'o ma mar dang kha rar bcas //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-30: rnam rgyal bum pa dri yi chus //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-31: rab tu bkang ba gzhag par bya //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-32: de nas khrus la sogs byas la //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-33: dri dang phreng mchog phreng ba can //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-34: dri zhim kha bkang mchog mdzes pa //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-35: rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-36: me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug /
K12D0483_H0457:360b-37: gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor //
K12D0483_H0457:360b-38: mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-2: lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-3: dza: h'um bam ho: thugs rje'i bdag /
K12D0483_H0457:361a-4: tshur gshegs zhes ni brjod nas kyang //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-5: gsang ba'i bcing ba bcings nas ni //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-6: mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-7: zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-8: de nyid lcags sgrog tshul du bya //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-9: mtheb gnyis nang du bkug nas ni //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-10: bskyod par gyur nas dbang du 'gyur //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-11: de nas mtshan ma skyes nas mgu nas ni //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-12: thog ma tha ma med pa mngon sum mthong //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-13: aa rga mchog brtags bsang la sogs pa yi //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-14: dbyangs snyan pa yis bstod dang lha rdzas kyi //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-15: mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-16: de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-17: sems can bkres shing skom pas gdungs pa dang //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-18: phyogs na gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag /
K12D0483_H0457:361a-19: de yi gtor ma ji ltar mthun par bya //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-20: de nas sngags pas bla med byang chub kyi //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-21: gnas su slob ma yongs su smin bya ba //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-22: 'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub par //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-23: de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du gzhug /
K12D0483_H0457:361a-24: de rnams byin rlabs byang chub smon lam gdab //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-25: zab cing rgya che ba yi chos bsgrags la //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-26: bsrung bar byas nas brtul zhugs sngom gnas pa //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-27: rang gi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par bya //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-28: dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g-yogs nas ni //
K12D0483_H0457:361a-29: rdo rje 'dzin dpal padmar lag gnyis bya //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-0: me tog rin chen la sogs de @361b brgyan la //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-1: yon gyis lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-3: aom badzra aa dhi ti shtha h'um/
K12D0483_H0457:361b-4: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um/
K12D0483_H0457:361b-5: aom badzra pra be sha h'um/
K12D0483_H0457:361b-6: aa sa me tri sa me mah'a sa ma ye h'um//
K12D0483_H0457:361b-7: de nas sngags 'dis me tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-8: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-9: bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-10: 'gro la phan phyir gtso chen gyis //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-11: sman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-12: aom badzra pra ti grihna h'um/
K12D0483_H0457:361b-13: aom badzra pra t'itstsha badzra sa ma ya stvam//
K12D0483_H0457:361b-14: me tog rin chen la sogs gang //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-15: bab par gyur ba'i rigs kyi lha //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-16: gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-17: dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-18: de nas sngags pa mkhas pa yis //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-19: sngags 'dis dam tshigs sbyin par bya //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-20: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um phat/
K12D0483_H0457:361b-21: de nas rigs kyi phyag rgya snying gar bcings te
K12D0483_H0457:361b-22: dam tshig gi lha snying la gnas par bya ba'i
K12D0483_H0457:361b-23: sngags / aom badzra sa ma ya hrim da yam me pra be sha dri dha tishtha tishtha h'um/
K12D0483_H0457:361b-24: de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-25: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-26: dam tshig 'das na sreg bar byed //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-27: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-29: ci ste dam tshig 'das na ni //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-30: de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-31: rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-32: bdun rgyud rigs ni brlag par mdzad //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-33: de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-34: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang //
K12D0483_H0457:361b-35: sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'//
K12D0483_H0457:361b-36: shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-2: ma byin par yang blang mi bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-3: brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-4: dngos grub 'dod pas bya ma yin //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-5: chang ni btung bar mi bya zhing /
K12D0483_H0457:362a-6: sha la sogs pa bza' mi bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-7: sems can gnod pa'i sbyor ba ni //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-8: nam yang bya ba ma yin te //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-9: dkon mchog gsum ni yongs mi spangs //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-10: dus kun tu ni byang chub sems //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-11: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-12: lha dang bla ma de bzhin no //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-13: sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-14: bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-15: lha la phul ba'i rnying po dang //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-16: de yi grib ma 'gom mi bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-17: phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin te //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-18: sngags dang lha la'ang smad mi bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-19: gdon gyi las sogs bya ma yin //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-20: mu stegs can la'ang smad mi bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-21: mdor na yid gnyis som gnyis the tshom mi bya ste //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-22: bdag gi de nyid dang ni sogs de bzhin no //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-23: mos pa brtan dang ldan pas dam bcas nas //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-24: sarba bid kyis ji bzhin dbang bskur te //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-25: bum pa la sogs ji snyed mang thogs pas //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-26: bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-27: de nas lag tu dril dang rdo rje byin //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-28: 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-29: mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor lo thob pa dang //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-30: sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-31: sngags bsgrub phyir ni mos ldan slob ma la //
K12D0483_H0457:362a-32: sngags pas bka' ni rab tu bsgo bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-0: des kyang mos @362b pas spyi bos phyag 'tshal te //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-1: ci ste nor yod bla ma dbul bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-2: nor dang gter dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gser //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-3: bzhon pa khyim gdan bu pho bu mo rnams //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-4: skyes pa dag dang bud med yang na ni //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-5: grong dang grong khyer de bzhin ci bzhed rnams //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-6: rang gi sems ni rab tu dad pa yis //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-7: yon gyi mchog nyid dbul ba nyid du bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-8: myur du 'grub phyir mos pas bla ma la //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-9: mdor na rang gi lus kyang dbul bar bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-10: tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-11: 'jig rten phyi ma'i bde mchog dang //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-13: lha yi bde ba smos ci dgos //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-14: sangs rgyas kun dang bla ma mnyam //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-15: rdo rje slob dpon brnyas na ni //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-16: rtag tu sdug bsngal mthong 'gyur bas //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-17: cung zad tsam yang brnyas mi bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-18: rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-19: rdo rje ma rnams nyid la ni //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-20: rnal 'byor can gyis brnyas ma yin //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-21: rtag tu 'khon gyi gcug mi bya //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-22: dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-23: bla ma gnod byed ma rungs pa //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-24: dam tshig las ni 'das pa dang //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-25: de la sogs pa'i gnod byed la //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-26: bzod pa bsgom par mi bya ste //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-27: de ltar gyur na kun rig gis //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-28: gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-29: sems can kun la phan pa dang //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-30: brtser ldan dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12D0483_H0457:362b-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12D0483_H0457:362b-32: lha'i 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi don dang /
K12D0483_H0457:362b-34: bde ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so //
K12D0483_H0457:363a-1: ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de bzhin du bris la /
K12D0483_H0457:363a-2: g-yas su ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams
K12D0483_H0457:363a-3: cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po
K12D0483_H0457:363a-4: / g-yon phyogs su ni sh'akya thub pa /
K12D0483_H0457:363a-5: ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i 'og tu ni kun
K12D0483_H0457:363a-6: tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba lta
K12D0483_H0457:363a-7: bu phyag na padma bsnams pa'o //
